import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Download Report</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/report/{id}/download"}></MethodEndpoint>



Downloads the compliance report with the specified ID. If the report is scheduled, then the request downloads the latest generated report.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"Report ID","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

success

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"204"} value={"204"}><div>

pending

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

error

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"404"} value={"404"}><div>

not_found / error

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
